11121.content:
A break in the tour was exactly what Louis and all the boys needed. It was fun but gruelling going up on stage virtually every night, every week. There was little respite either when they were not on stage, the boys' days were filled with doing interviews, promos and the usual PR stuff that any celebrity must undertake.

Two weeks of complete freedom...The other four headed out to their own individual destinations across the country. Louis however stayed at the hotel were the boys would rendezvous in two weeks to resume their world tour. And in that time he planned to do nothing.

Sneaking out from under management's noses, wearing a thick grey hoodie and dark sunglasses, Louis heads down into the hotel lobby, disguised and intent on finding the gym. He walks across the polished marble floors quickly in what he thinks is the right direction, praying no one recognises him. He is unshaven and unshowered. Little point in that if he was going to sweat it out in the gym.

As he races across the hotel lobby, the unmistakable and irresistible scent of cooked bacon fills his nostrils. He slows down and inhales deeply. His brain registers the aroma and immediately signals to his stomach.

A pang of hunger shoots through his abdomen.

I am completely starving

Shooting a glance in the direction of the gym, then towards the breakfast restaurant, he gives in to the visceral urge and follows the scent of bacon.

Inside the restaurant, the smell of bacon intensifies greatly. His stomach shoots another pang of hunger through his abdomen as though demanding he hurry up.

Louis spots an empty table in the back, where he will be well hidden behind a half wall and an indoor plant. The last thing he wants is a fan girl recognising him, screaming and drawing attention to him. It was too early for that kind of attention.

Grabbing a plate at the beginning of the buffet, Louis piles on whatever he can see. Bacon, of course, eggs, pancakes, and a great dollop of ketchup on the side. What ever he doesn't want he can leave. Louis leaves nothing however. After fifteen minutes he has cleared his plate.

He leans back in his dining chair that is hidden by the half wall and indoor plant and belches under his breath.

Thank God I am wearing sweats

He rubs his tummy, it is bloated and full.

It is a luxury being able to eat what he wants and how much of it he feels like. Usually, the bands management keep a strict eye and strict rules about what the boys can he. High energy, low fat foods. He really should be keeping to their dietary sanctions on his time off, but no one is scrutinising his every move...

Louis finds himself craving more food. He might very well be full, but sitting in the restaurant with the smell of bacon all around him is too much. He repeats as he did when he first entered the restaurant, stacking his plate high.

Each bite full takes more effort on his second round, pushing the food into his mouth. then methodically chewing each mouth full. He swallows hard to force the food down. It is hard work but he enjoys it, and he some how manages to finish his second plate.

He has consumed more food than he thought humanly possible. He wipes at his mouth to get away can crumbs and ketchup that is left lingering. He unzips his hoodie, the white t-shirt below is tight around his full stomach. He can see the shadowed outline of his belly button.

As Louis breathes in, he find his lungs struggling to fill as his stomach is taking up so much room.

Tomorrow, tomorrow I'll go to the gym.

This is a promise that Louis makes each day and doesn't fulfil. Walking past that restaurant every morning, afternoon and evening proves too tempting.

On his fifth morning of sitting at his hidden table and gorging on the abundant selection of food, he thinks to himself

I have two weeks off, fuck it, I'll go back to the gym when all of management and the boys are back. This is my time to do nothing.

After taking a breather, Louis pushes himself out from his table and heads back up to the hotel room for a nap. Eating takes a lot of a boy.

A familiar Northern voice replied.

'Hello, it's Harry.'

'Hey, how's you?' Louis' mind was still half asleep, barely able to form full and coherent sentences. He stood up from the bed and walked around on the plush cream carpet, trying to get his body fully functioning again.

'Listen Louis, I'm low on credit and making this long distance call,' then adopting a mock dramatic voice 'TIME IS RUNNING OUT!'

Louis laughed, the imitation was terrible but he found it genuinely funny. That only added to its hilarity.

'Basically what I am phoning to say is our holiday is longer than planned.'

'What?' Louis' half asleep mind was able to register that this was an unexpected announcement.

'Something to do with rescheduling the next few weeks concerts...they're no longer next week but somewhere near the end of...'

BEEP

Louis wasn't too bothered about what Harry was actually saying, their schedule was forever being swapped around. He was disappointed that he didn't get to speak to him longer.

During the brief conversation Louis had wandered across the hotel room and was presently in front of a full length.

The reflection looking back was an average height boy, his skin shiny with sweat. His hair was stuck up at awkward angles.

What struck Louis was his body. He looked different from two weeks ago, not hugely but definitely different.

Two weeks ago, he had had a 30 inch waist, a slight tummy maybe. Louis thought maybe the gym would have been a good idea.

It had only been two weeks, but his body had softened up and grown slightly all over. He had a stomach paunch that stuck out, he could see love handles, moobs. His jaw line wasn't square and defined like before, it was soft and round. Louis was fat. In his two weeks off he had been virtually alone, and had spent almost all of his time eating. Curious, he went into the bathroom and hopped on the scales.

'Jesus, 171 pounds!' He heard himself say.

21 pounds in two weeks. It was sort of to be expected. Using all that energy on the tour with a low calorie diet for months, then the complete opposite.

'I am Fabio.' announced the man in accent heavy with South American tones. 'And you are Louis Tomlinson.'

'Yes, I am.'

Fabio walked around Louis, taking him in.

'The man that called was right,' said Fabio. 'You are fat. A great fat, greedy pig. Look at you, so gluttonous.' Fabio poked Louis in his stomach.

'Look at that big belly. Do not worry, Fabio can change that. Take off the shirt boy.'

'I don't have anything else...' Louis began before Fabio silenced him.

'What's the matter? Are you too embarassed? Do you not want to show off your big, fat body? Too bad. You are in Fabio's world now, and I am the boss. Take off your shirt.'

Louis, hesitant for a moment, unfastened the buttons left on the shirt, and dropped it into Fabio's hands.

'Now, onto the machine.' said Fabio pointing at the treadmill. Louis walked over and stood on the stationary machine. All around him were reflections of his body. Fabio was right, he did have a big, fat body. Admiring it from angels he had not seen before, Louis could see just how big he had gotten. His belly, was round and very pronounced, from the side it stretched out far in front of him. Rolls of fat piled under his arms, and around his waist, accentuated by his tight shorts pushing it all up. Louis liked his big, fat body.

As the last bar slammed, the belt of the running machine started to move below Louis's feet. He almost fell over, but managed to catch his balance in time. He was moving at a gentle walking pace.

I can do this Louis thought. That was before the machine sped up.

His breath was ragged, loud and raspy. His body desperate for air. He couldn't do it, he was too fat. It was too hard. He had run for hours when he played football, up and down a pitch. 'I'm afraid you had a nasty accident young man.' said the Doctor, 'You're lucky you only came away with a broken leg. You hit your head badly, but fortunately no permanent damage was sustained. You'll be given a heavy dose of steroids and not be walking for...I would say 4 to 6 months.'

Zayn hadn't really noticed before, but could see quite clearly now he had a soft belly poking out. Only a month ago it had been a flat stomach....

The doctor fixed his calipers onto Zayn's stomach, about an inch above his right hip. He grabbed a significant amount with them.

'Hmmm, about 24%..' said the doctor. 'You can put your t-shirt on again Zayn.'

The doctor made some notes on his chart as he spoke to Zayn.

'You've made some very good progress. Your leg is healing much better than we expected. As I said, it will be a while until it is totally healed again, but these things take time. Now, you have gained a significant amount of weight, you're just over the threshold of being recognised as overweight, but I wouldn't worry. You're able to be much more active now with that cast off. I'll keep you on the medication and you can come back in a month. Any questions?'

Zayn had none.

'Good, we're all done here then. Have a pleasant day Mr Malik.'
1523111.title: Zayn arrives at the hospital

choices: Niall and Zayn go for food
The next night, the boys are getting dressed for the press event
15231112.content:
Thinking he was up to the task, One Direction's management arranged for Zayn to join the boys at a press event that night. The had also set up a suit fitting, to have the boys dressed appropriately for the occasion.

Zayn arrived the the boutique store where he was to get his suit fitted. Inside, a severe looking woman directed him to door at the left of the store. He hobbled over and went in.

It was a large room, with mirrors and racks of clothes covering every walls. Niall was there, and a male tailor was measuring him for a suit. Niall was standing in the middle of the room in his boxer shorts, with his arms up as the tailor put the tape around his waist.

Zayn noticed that Niall looked a little different. Zayn had seen Niall topless loads of times, all the guys had to bunk together on tour buses. Niall was not the most chiseled of the boys, (that was Liam easily) he always had carried a slight belly. But those times he spent with Zayn just gorging on food had clearly taken their toll. Niall's belly, while not as pronounced as Zayn's, stuck out considerably more. He knew Niall had always had a bigger waist than the rest of the guys, because he was the only one who had his own jeans and belts, all a size bigger.

Now Niall had grown, his belly was soft and pronounced. Zayn could see fat spilling over the band Niall's boxers, especially at his lower back where the beginnings of love handles sat. Niall's face too had gained a little weight. His cheeks were fuller.

'You are a 34, verging on a 36.' said the tailor. He walked away from Niall to a rack of clothing ad rifled through it.

'Looks like I've been enjoying my food a little too much.' Niall said jokingly to Zayn, and he wobble his little belly up and down.

'You're not the only one!' said Zayn as he lifted up his t-shirt and slapped his own gut, laughing.

'Wow! At least I know I am not the fattest!' laughed Niall as he looked at Zayn's wobbly tummy jiggle.

'Here' interrupted the tailor. Take this. He handed some clothes to Niall, who went into a corner and started to put them on. Zayn watch Niall bend over, watched the fat he had acquired roll and crease and spill over the band of his boxers as he bent down to pull the trousers on.

'Strip' commanded the tailor.

Zayn through his t-shirt and sweats off.

'Lift your arms.' Zayn complied.

The tailor put the red tape around Zayn's waist at his naval. Zayn could see his body in the mirrors, from all angles. He never realized just how the weight he had acquired dissipated over his body. His belly was pronounced, he had a slight over hand over his boxers. He had grabble love handles. His ass was plump, his legs and arms thick.

'Hmm, you seem to be a 36inch waist.' said the tailor. 'A little bigger than I was told you would be, but I can work with it.'

The tailor eventually found a navy suit for Zayn. He pulled it on, and it fitted better than anything he had worn in the past few months. The tailor handed him a belt, one he had worn to previous events. It had 6 notches, and before Zayn pulled it in 5 of those. Today, he only had to pull it in 1...

'
15231112.title: Zayn has a suit fitting

choices: One of their belts bursts open
152311121.content: Enjoying the comfort in the well fitted suit, Zayn decided to keep it on until he got home. Niall, however, changed back into his slightly tight light wash jeans and his brown leather belt, which made quite an overhang of his soft, pale stomach. It was obvious where his body had forced his belt to fit on a looser hole. They both decided to go to McDonald's drive thru on the way back to Zayn's house. When Niall sat down in the car, his t shirt rose up above the bottom of his love handles, revealing how much he was bulging over his belt. Zayn was oddly turned on by the sight, although he didn't say anything. Zayn could feel his stomach rolling out over his belt in a way it didn't used to, and he pushed out his belly as much as possible while leaning back. His shirt became untucked, and his belt creaked and threatened to burst under the pressure.
152311121.title: Niall and Zayn go for food

1523111212.content:
On the way home Niall decided he couldn't wait so he started to eat a few fries from his order and quickly he began eating his burgers, taking a sip of his Coke now and then. Through the corners of his eyes, Zayn could see how Niall's belly started to bulge out a little bit further. They might have went crazy when they were ordering burgers at the drive thru because Niall had already eaten three of his burgers and the bag still seemed to be full.Zayn didn't mind because that meant Niall had to eat a lot more and he, oddly enough, wanted to see Niall's belly get bigger.
Zayn couldn't help, but to take a burger while driving too and started munching on it, which made his belt creak more.
When they were finally home, Niall's belt suddenly bursts open, which startled Zayn a little bit. Niall's jeans was now opened and his belly was spilling out a couple of inches further.
"Oops, I think I need a new jeans," Niall said while looking at his belly. "And we need to go to the drive thru again," he added.
Zayn looked at the McDonald's bag, which was empty. "You ate mine too?" Zayn exclaimed. Niall just nodded
1523111212.title: One of their belts bursts open

choices: Zayn goes to the event and eats more, despite his worry about popping a button
Zayn goes to the event and restrains himself, but the boys comment on his weight
152311122.content:
Zayn figured that, with a new suit several sizes up at his disposal, he could afford to indulge a little before the press event without having to worry about not being able to do up his pants, a problem he had been encountering more and more frequently with most of his usual clothes. The new suit, he was sure, would have more than enough room for his bloated stomach. Besides, he reasoned, it's not like he was going to stuff himself to the extent that he normally did -- there would be food at the event, after all, and he wanted to leave some room. He was just going to eat enough to leave himself feeling pleasantly sated, so he could attend the event with the warm feeling he got in his gut when his belly was pleasantly full, but not painfully so.

With that in mind, Zayn immediately began to peruse the hotel's room service menu, although by now he knew it almost by heart. As it was a cold day, he decided on a warm, hearty soup as a starter, followed by three main courses -- the Pasta Primavera, the Mediterranean Chicken, and the Creole Steak -- and finally a selection of desserts. By the time he had finished eating, he was far, far more stuffed than he had intended, with his distended belly arcing out dramatically over the waistband of his boxers.

Zayn lay back on his bed, barely able to move, much less get himself ready for the event. Rising up above him in a giant mound was his unwieldy belly, stretched to capacity and achingly full in the way that Zayn had come to love. He reached out a hand lazily and began to gently massage, desperately trying to help his stomach digest some of the food so that he would be able to dress himself for the event. He lay there for at least half an hour before he finally managed to force himself upright. Waddling about his room, he cleared up his food detritus a bit, before moving on in search of his suit.

Taking the suit out of his closet, he began to cautiously put on the suit trousers, careful to avoid jostling his sore belly. He got the trousers on with much more ease than he was accustomed to with his smaller clothing, but despite sitting comfortably on his hips at the fitting the previous day, the waistband still bit painfully into his strained stomach.

"I've definitely overdone it today," Zayn thought to himself. He wondered if maybe he ought not to have stuffed himself right before an event -- with an empty belly, the suit would have accommodated his new weight nicely, but with his stomach distended the way it was, he was certain that if he ate a single bite at the event, the button would pop.

In light of this, Zayn decided to forgo his belt, certain that it would only add to his discomfort. With that decided, he set about to buttoning his white dress shirt over himself. His stomach pressed out unforgivingly against the fitted shirt, and the outline of his pecs, much softer and droopier than they had been a month ago, was clearly visible beneath the fabric.

Still, looking in the mirror as he pulled the suit jacket on to finish the ensemble, he didn't think he looked half bad. The extra weight kind of suited him, he thought, staring intently at his own face and admiring what he thought might be the beginnings of a double chin.

Zayn bent down uncomfortably to put on his shoes, struggling a bit to reach them in the wake of his girth. Feeling reasonably good about himself, in spite of the continuous ache of fullness in his stomach, he set out to meet the rest of the boys, excited to see them after such a long time without having seen any of them other than Niall.
